global.fees_warning: Remember, any transaction that moves assets within, to, or from the Ethereum blockchain will incur gas fees. Only transactions conducted exclusively on Polygon are gas-less.

actions.set_description: Click here to set a description...

account_card_header.tooltip_ethereum: Your MANA balance on the main Ethereum blockchain. You can swap MANA from this balance to Polygon.
account_card_header.tooltip_matic: Your MANA balance on Polygon's sidechain. You can use Polygon MANA without paying for gas fees. You can withdraw MANA from Polygon's sidechain at any time.

receive_mana_modal.title: Receive Tokens
receive_mana_modal.message: If you want to receive tokens in this wallet you can do it by sharing your address

transfer_mana_modal.title: Send Tokens
transfer_mana_modal.subtitle: Send Tokens to the desired Wallet

import_withdrawal_modal.title: Import Withdrawal
import_withdrawal_modal.description: Withdrawals are a 2-step process. You initialize a withdrawal with a Polygon transaction that burns your Polygon MANA, and after some minutes you are able to unlock your MANA tokens on Ethereum. We store the information from the first transaction on your device, and it's necessary to finish your withdrawal. If for some reason this information is lost (ie. you erase your browser's storage) or if you are finishing your withdrawal from a new device, you can use this screen to recover your withdrawal information by entering the hash of the withdrawal initialization transaction (in Polygon). You can see all your latest transaction on {link}

errors.duplicate: This Withdrawal already exists on your list
errors.already_processed: This Withdrawal has already been completed

edit_profile_avatar_description_modal.title: Edit avatar's profile description
edit_profile_avatar_description_modal.subtitle: Set a new description for the avatar of this profile
edit_profile_avatar_description_modal.error_header: An error occured while saving the description

convert_mana_modal.subtitle_ethereum: Deposit MANA from Ethereum into Polygon
convert_mana_modal.subtitle_matic: Withdraw MANA from Polygon into Ethereum
convert_mana_modal.withdrawal_cost: This operation consists of two steps. The first step won't have any cost. The second one will cost approximately {cost} of gas fees on Ethereum.

authorization.confirm_transaction_title: Complete transaction to deposit the MANA
authorization.authorize_mana_description: Keep in mind that some wallets require setting a custom MANA spending limit. Enter what you want to deposit {price} MANA or a higher amount you're comfortable with. You can change the limit at any time.
authorization.set_cap_description: Enter what you want to deposit {price} MANA or a higher amount you're comfortable with. You can change the limit at any time.

deposit_tooltip.text: Remember, any transaction that moves assets within, to, or from the Ethereum blockchain will incur gas fees. Only transactions conducted exclusively on Polygon are gas-less. After initializing your deposit, there is a 30 minute delay before your assets will be transferred to Polygon

withdrawal_tooltip.text: After initializing your withdrawal, you must wait 30 minutes before reaching a checkpoint. After the checkpoint is reached, a transaction will be triggered in your Ethereum wallet that you must sign to complete the withdrawal

meta_transaction_failure.title: Meta transaction
meta_transaction_failure.body: There was an error sending the meta transaction.{br}Please try again or join our {discord_link} to get support.

notifications.title: Email Notifications
notifications.description: Don't miss any Decentraland notifications when you're AFK! Sign up to receive email notifications and pick & choose which ones you want to get below.
notifications.subscription_group_description_marketpla: Get notifications about your purchases, prizes, sales, royalties, and rentals
notifications.subscription_group_description_events: Get notifications about events you’ve RSVP’d to
notifications.subscription_group_description_dao: Get notifications about DAO motions you’ve voted on, your proposal process, and more.
notifications.subscription_group_description_worlds: Get notified if your World has insufficient storage or if you’re invited to visit/collaborate on a World

description.without_email: Enter your email, then check your inbox for an email with the confirmation link. After confirming, you will be able to customize the notifications below.
description.pending_approval: Confirmation email sent, check your inbox.
description.with_email: If you'd like to update your email address, edit it below. Make sure to check for the confirmation email in your inbox afterwards!

types.governance_coauthor_requested: Request to Co-Author a Proposal Received
types.governance_new_comment_on_project_update: New Comment on Your Project Update
types.governance_voting_ended_voter: Voting Ended on a Proposal You Voted On
types.governance_pitch_passed: Pitch That You Voted on Passed
types.governance_tender_passed: Tender That You Voted on Passed
types.worlds_access_restricted: World Access Restricted Due to Insufficient Storage
